categories: Category:Legends short stories from Star Wars Insider

nodes.text: League of Spies is a short story written by Aaron Allston that was originally published in Star Wars Insider 73. In March 2008, it was archived on Hyperspace. It was also included in a Czech-language anthology Setkání v mlze.

In the midst of the Clone Wars, a Republic Intelligence agent called Edbit Teeks goes missing on the world of Tarhassan, which has recently declared itself for the Confederacy of Independent Systems. A team of newly-recruited agents is sent to rescue him, but their inexperience starts to threaten the entire mission and it comes down to Joram Kithe to save the day.
